name: KenoDB
tagline: Turn-key program to log Massachusetts Keno Numbers
body:
### Welcome to KenoDB [![Version 1.5](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.5-brightgreen.svg)](https://github.com/AYJAYY/KenoDB)

KenoDB is setup so you can easily track Keno numbers. 

It outputs several files, a full log of the day's numbers in multiple formats and other draw info, as well as a list of the numbers drawn for the day in a single row to do pivot table analysis on the hot/coldness of numbers. For troubleshooting it logs all successes and failures into two HTML log files. 

Also included is an Access database file with a table that has the correct header titles and rows created to import the data from the kenodbfull.csv file.

***

### Note to Windows Users
Using the task scheduler you can use the nightly.bat file to create a nightly task. Just edit the nightly.bat file to fit your file locations / Windows Username. Then you can add a nightly task to run the nightly.bat file. For more information on scheduling a task click the link below.

[_Microsoft Schedule a Task Guide_](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc748993.aspx)

***

[![Python 2.*](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-2.7-blue.svg)](http://python.org) [![Contact AYJAY](https://img.shields.io/badge/contact-AYJAY-orange.svg)](mailto:ayjay@programmer.net)
